=================================================

Series using the Look at Life documentary shorts to examine 1960s British society.


In November 2012, the series Britain on Film commissioned by BBC Scotland for broadcast on BBC Four began a twenty part series providing an insight into life in Britain in the 1960s exclusively featuring footage from the Look at Life series. 


Distributed by ITN Source, a partly owned subsidiary of ITV Plc, each episode features a different aspect of British life and culture during the decade, including the changing role of women and how leisure time was spend including the rising popularity of overseas travel. 


It is presented with original commentary from the series with captions to provide the contemporary viewer with explanation
